text: Do you want to help me make a difference?
Sure
Have you heard of Save The Children, a well-acknowledged chairty?
yes. I have donated before.
Would you like to donate again?
Not sure why?
Children like Maria can use your help. She is one of ten children. They need all the help they can get. They live in a war zone.
Oh that is horrible. I think I might donate. I think any amount of money will help. Are you going to donate?
I try to donate monthly. I will donate again this month. I think of how just a cup of coffee can pay for a meal for a family in another country like Maria.
That is powerful. A little goes a long way for people in need. We may  not think much about a couple of bucks but to other people that can mean food for a day or two.
You're not donating just to the child but the family and helping them all.
I think I could donate 25 cents. Will that be enough to help in some aspect? What is a general rule of thumb when making donations?
Ten cents is good. Twenty cents is better. 25 cents is better. But fifty cents can really help.
I think I will stick with 25 cents. I usually try to stay consistent when making a effort to help others.
How about thirty cents?
Ok. I can do 30 cents. I like to help other people less fortunate than me.
Do you think you can donate again next year too?
Maybe. I am always open minded to helping other humans in need. I will probably donate late this year as well.
Ok. So 30 cents is your final donation for today?
Yes. I would like to donate 30 cents. It is part of being a good human being.
